Package com.blakfx.chat

Class ConflatedMessageCacheInMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blakfx.chat.MessageCacheInMemory
      • com.blakfx.chat.ConflatedMessageCacheInMemory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageCache
    public class ConflatedMessageCacheInMemory
extends MessageCacheInMemory
    A parent cache to other caches, that is responsible for printing all contents. In our implementation, the screen cache serves this functionality.

    • Field Summary

        aCacheSize - the number of max elements that this cache will hold

    • Method Detail

      • saveContactMessage

        public boolean saveContactMessage​(String aContactName,
                                  String aMessage,
                                  boolean shouldPrint)
        Add a contact message, either a file notification or text content, to this contact cache. Note: all messages added here are added to the separate screen cache They are all added under the name of the "self contact"
        Specified by:
        saveContactMessage in interface MessageCache
        Overrides:
        saveContactMessage in class MessageCacheInMemory
        Parameters:
        aContactName - The contact associated with this message
        aMessage - The file notification or text content to add
        shouldPrint - Whether this add operation should be followed by a print of the cache
        Returns:
        whether the operation succeeded
